name: Pecunity
description: Pecunity (PEC) is a fair-launch, deflationary DeFi token uniting automated, community-driven strategies across chains. With real products like a Smart Contract Wallet, Dashboard, and NFT Marketplace, Pecunity offers gasless transactions, easy onboarding, and sustainable passive income within a transparent DeFi ecosystem. Effortlessly earn passive income with DeFi strategies by uniting the best crypto protocols across chains with automated community-driven strategies.
